messageobject.name: Player
messageobject.documentation: Synchronous message. Contains information about other players in the game, like their current velocity, position, weapon and reachability. Only reports those players that are visible. (within field of view and not occluded).

property.name: Jmx
property.documentation: Exported just for control server. Holds jmx address we need to connect to when we want to debug our bot.

property.name: Name
property.documentation: Human readable name of the player.

property.name: Spectator
property.documentation: Whether this player is in SPECTATE mode. Humans can change the mode during runtime!

property.name: Action
property.documentation: Atomic action this bot is doing (BDI).

property.name: Visible
property.documentation: If the player is in the field of view of the bot.

property.name: Rotation
property.documentation: Which direction the player is facing in absolute terms.

property.name: Location
property.documentation: An absolute location of the player within the map.

property.name: Velocity
property.documentation: Absolute velocity of the player as a vector of movement per one game second.

property.name: Team
property.documentation: What team the player is on. 255 is no team. 0-3 are red, blue, green, gold in that order.

property.name: Weapon
property.documentation: Class of the weapon the player is holding. Weapon strings to look for include: "AssaultRifle", "ShieldGun", "FlakCannon", "BioRifle", "ShockRifle", "LinkGun", "SniperRifle", "RocketLauncher", "Minigun", "LightingGun", "Translocator". TODO: Look if this is all.

property.name: Crouched
property.documentation: True if the bot is crouched.

property.name: Firing
property.documentation: 0 means is not firing, 1 - firing in primary mode, 2 - firing in secondary mode (alt firing).

property.name: EmotLeft
property.documentation: For UE2. Holds left emoticon of the bot, "None" means none set.

property.name: EmotCenter
property.documentation: For UE2. Holds center emoticon of the bot, "None" means none set.

property.name: EmotRight
property.documentation: For UE2. Holds right emoticon of the bot, "None" means none set.

property.name: Bubble
property.documentation: For UE2. Holds the bubble of the emoticon of the bot, "None" means none set.

property.name: Anim
property.documentation: For UE2. Current played animation of the bot.
